name: Ghost Collector
description:
Ghost Collector was built as an Arcade game to be played on Lythbound. Your score will fail to send when playing the game here. Please play at Lythbound.com for your score to count in our high score table!

Additionally, games on Lythbound will receive updates before games on Itch. Please be aware this may not be the most recent version!

The Ringleader didn't always have a faire populated with eidolons...

Before she started the faire, she was tasked with collecting them. Help her collect the eidolons (who appear as ghosts).

✦ Click or tap on an eidolon to collect them before they disappear. Allowing one to disappear will cause you to lose a life.

✦ Pause the game by clicking or tapping the || icon in the top right.

✦ Rarely, a special "+1" eidolon may appear which will grant an extra life if successfully tapped.

✦ This game has two modes to choose from:

Casual Mode: Eidolons appear at a consistent speed indefinitely but are worth fewer points.
Hard Mode: Eidolons appear at increasingly faster speeds but are worth more points.
